AboutPage.title: About FMH ‚Äì For My Health
AboutPage.subtitle: Delivering dignity, restoring hope, and supporting everyday health.
AboutPage.missionText:
At FMH ‚Äì For My Health, our mission is to Deliver. Restore. Daily.

We serve children, families, and seniors facing hardship by providing consistent access to nourishment, hygiene care, and essential items. Through direct delivery and compassionate outreach, we help strengthen underserved communities across Little Rock and beyond.

We believe that true health means more than medicine. It‚Äôs having dignity at every moment. Through consistent outreach and compassion, FMH provides food, clothes, hygiene kits, educational supplies, and seasonal essentials ‚Äî meeting people where they are and restoring strength one delivery at a time.

values.empathyText: FMH meets people where they are ‚Äî on the streets, in shelters, or at their front doors.
values.communityText: True health means restoring dignity, stability, and hope ‚Äî not just meeting needs.
values.transparencyText: Poverty and hunger don‚Äôt take breaks ‚Äî and neither should compassion.
values.localImpactText: Serving children, families, and seniors across Little Rock with food access, hygiene support, and seasonal outreach.

AboutPage.storyText:
FMH ‚Äì For My Health was born from a simple truth: health is more than medicine. It is food on the table, clean clothes, warmth in winter, and dignity in every moment.

Founded in Little Rock, Arkansas, by Sy‚ÄôViceeaa Hall, FMH began as a small outreach effort helping families who were slipping through the cracks ‚Äî the working mothers skipping meals so their children could eat, seniors choosing between medication and heating, and unhoused neighbors often overlooked.

What started as personal deliveries of food and hygiene items grew into a structured, community-based system built on three words: Deliver. Restore. Daily. These words became more than a tagline ‚Äî they became a model of compassion in action.

Today, FMH supports hundreds of Arkansans through food access, hygiene kits, educational supplies, and the annual ‚ÄúWarm Hands = Warm Hearts‚Äù Winter Initiative. As FMH expands, it aims to reach thousands, restoring hope one delivery at a time.
AboutPage.joinText: Whether you want to volunteer, contribute, or request help ‚Äî you are a part of restoring dignity, health, and hope for families across Arkansas.

header.title: Our Services
header.subtitle: At Community Connect (FMH), we make it easier for communities, volunteers, and admins to come together ‚Äî ensuring help reaches those who need it most, right on time.

request.title: Request Assistance
request.description: Need food, hygiene kits, or clothing? Use our simple public form to request help quickly and easily ‚Äî even offline.

admin.title: Admin Quick Entry
admin.description: Admins can log field requests instantly, tagging them by need type and priority to ensure no request is missed.

delivery.title: Delivery Tracking
delivery.description: From request to delivery ‚Äî track every stage transparently. Volunteers can update statuses in real time.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Volunteers stay updated with active requests and statuses, enabling smooth coordination and faster help.

donor.title: Donor Support
donor.description: Donors can contribute directly or pledge recurring support ‚Äî every contribution is tracked for transparency.

PrivacyPage.paragraph1: Nous collectons les informations de contact uniquement pour coordonner les livraisons. Toutes les donn√©es personnelles sont chiffr√©es, stock√©es en toute s√©curit√© et ne sont jamais vendues sous aucune circonstance.
PrivacyPage.paragraph2: FMH ‚Äì For My Health fonctionne selon un mod√®le sans revente. 100 % des fournitures et informations collect√©es soutiennent directement les actions communautaires √† Little Rock et dans les environs.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Service
TermsPage.paragraph1: FMH ‚Äì For My Health is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit providing community outreach services. By using this site, you agree to these terms, including the collection of basic contact information necessary to coordinate deliveries and volunteer communication.
TermsPage.paragraph2: All donations support direct community outreach programs, including events, deliveries, and seasonal initiatives. FMH maintains a zero-resale model ‚Äî 100% of donated supplies go directly to families.

Footer.description: FMH ‚Äì For My Health ¬∑ Deliver. Restore. Daily. ¬∑ Serving Little Rock and surrounding communities.
